section.section: A person may not knowingly allow another person to serve as a fiduciary in violation of paragraph (1) of this subsection.

text.section: Any person who intentionally violates subsection (a) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $10,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.

For the purposes of this section, a person is deemed to be convicted on the later of:
the date of judgment of the trial court; or
the date of the final sustaining of judgment on appeal.
A fiduciary may be removed for a violation of subsection (a) of this section.
